snippet: A review of “Former People: The Final Days of the Russian Aristocracy” and “The Summer Palaces of the Romanovs: Treasures From Tsarskoye Selo.”
abstract: Liesl Schillinger reviews books highlighting nostalgia for imperial Russia, including Former People: The Final Days of the Russian Aristocracy by Douglas Smith and The Summer Palaces of the Romanovs: Treasures From Tsarskoye Selo, edited by Emmanuel Ducamp.
lead_paragraph: A review of “Former People: The Final Days of the Russian Aristocracy” and “The Summer Palaces of the Romanovs: Treasures From Tsarskoye Selo.”

headline.seo: ‘Former People: The Final Days of the Russian Aristocracy’ and ‘The Summer Palaces of the Romanovs: Treasures From Tsarskoye Selo’
headline.main: Among the Ghosts of Imperial Russia
headline.print_headline: Among the Ghosts Of Imperial Russia
